about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey with "Hunter: Space Pirates" a captivating visual novel featuring over 700 stunning renders.

STORY OVERVIEW

Dive into the enthralling story of Hunter, a young man whose dreams of joining the Navy are shattered by an unexpected twist of fate. As he navigates the complexities of his daily life, Hunter finds himself on an unexpected path filled with mystery, personal growth, and discovery.

CHARACTER RELATIONSHIPS AND SCI-FI ELEMENTS

Explore Hunter's relationships with a diverse cast of characters, set against a backdrop of sci-fi elements woven through every aspect of the story. Experience a thrilling narrative filled with personal growth, discovery, and mature themes that add depth and realism to Hunter's journey.

THE JOURNEY OF HUNTER

In a world where the ordinary collides with the extraordinary, "Hunter: Space Pirates" tells a captivating tale of mystery and discovery. Meet Hunter, a young man navigating the complexities of his daily life while unknowingly tethered to a destiny far beyond his imagination.

As Hunter grapples with personal challenges and finds solace in unexpected friendships, his world suddenly shifts. His dream of joining the Navy shattered by a failed physical exam, Hunter is thrust onto an unexpected path.

UNVEILLING MYSTERIES

With echoes of ancient prophecies and a heritage waiting to be uncovered, Hunter embarks on a journey that transcends dimensions. From the quiet corners of his neighborhood to the vast expanse of outer space, every step reveals deeper mysteries and hidden truths about his own identity.

A GALACTIC ADVENTURE AWAITS

"Hunter: Space Pirates" is a compelling fusion of sci-fi and fantasy, blending intricate character dynamics with cosmic revelations. Perfect for players who crave adventure, intricate plots, and a touch of the unknown, this story promises to take you on a thrilling ride through the realms of imagination.



Note: This game contains mature themes and explicit content, intended for an adult audience.

Note 2: This is the base game, which includes Chapter 1, along with extra features like the Gallery menu, Characters menu, and Scene Jumper!

Note 3: Future chapters will be released as DLC.

content_descriptors.notes:
"Hunter: Space Pirates" is a Visual Novel (VN) for adults with explicit sex scenes. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

The game includes depictions of violence such as arena fights, physical assault, extortion, and implied death. Sexual content features masturbation, voyeurism, striptease, and nudity. The story also includes mentions of attempted sexual assault and elements of incest between certain characters.

All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

name: Hunter: Space Pirates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
